Legal_Issue: Whether the RAD erred in upholding the RPD's credibility assessment
Application_Facts: Applicant provided specific details about corruption and drug trafficking in his speeches; RPD rejected claim due to insufficient detail
Decision_Outcome: Federal Court allowed judicial review, overturned RAD decision
Court_Ruling: Federal Court found RAD committed a reviewable error in credibility analysis
Grounds_for_Claim: Perceived lack of detail in applicant's testimony regarding speeches
Legal_Standard: Credibility findings must be reasonable, intelligible, and justified based on evidence
Assessment_Factor: Level of detail in applicant's description of speeches
Procedural_Issue: Judicial review of administrative decision by RAD
Credibility_Assessment: RPD found applicant lacked sufficient detail; RAD upheld this assessment; Federal Court found assessment unreasonable
Evidence_Used: Transcript of applicant's testimony detailing corruption and drug trafficking
Application_Basis: Refugee protection based on risk due to political speeches
Evidence_Assessed: Specificity and plausibility of descriptions of speeches
Relief_Sought: Overturning of RAD decision and remand for reconsideration
Governing_Rule: Credibility findings must be reasonable, intelligible, and justified
Evidentiary_Deficiency: Alleged lack of detail in applicant’s testimony
Outcome: Application for judicial review granted; case remanded for reconsideration
Decisional_Body: Immigration and Refugee Board – Refugee Protection Division (RPD), Refugee Appeal Division (RAD)
Cause_Description: Refugee claim rejected due to credibility concerns over insufficient detail in testimony about anti-corruption speeches
Evidence_Handling: Transcript of testimony was reviewed by Federal Court to assess reasonableness of credibility finding
Evidence_Issues: Dispute over whether testimony contained sufficient detail to support credibility
Evidence_Assessment: Federal Court determined that applicant did provide specific details, making RPD's rejection unreasonable
Decision_Rationale: RAD failed to conduct a reasonable credibility assessment by endorsing an unjustified RPD finding
Evidentiary_Issues: Sufficiency and interpretation of detail in oral testimony
